Text:
wtf dude, I just made this torrent and just started to seed it half hour ago and your jacking my upload?

I'll be notifying the admins on TPB & mininova.


Kit
Not a nice move, but not against any rules... just a cockblock move... ;)

The admins on the forum were douchebags about it too. I asked nicely if they could remove it and they denied.

This will be my last flac upload here TPB. Such a shame - with almost 300 FLAC uploads to be treated second rate doesn't cut it for me. Thats one thing about TPB - they treat their uploaders like shit. No wonder axxo quit using the tracker

Even mininova deleted the torrent. An index site.

Oh, and Spotted Jackal, FUCK YOU.


Kit
Sorry to see Kitlope go, he uploaded a lot of good stuff :(
